elementSet.name: Dublin Core
elementSet.description: The Dublin Core metadata element set is common to all Omeka records, including items, files, and collections. For more information see, http://dublincore.org/documents/dces/.

element.name: Title
element.description: A name given to the resource

elementText.text: Ohio State Reformatory, State Archives Series 1416AV, "Bertillon cards with photographs [graphic], 1901-1921"

element.name: Description
element.description: An account of the resource

element.name: Creator
element.description: An entity primarily responsible for making the resource

element.name: Source
element.description: A related resource from which the described resource is derived

element.name: Date
element.description: A point or period of time associated with an event in the lifecycle of the resource

element.name: Identifier
element.description: An unambiguous reference to the resource within a given context

itemType.name: Type 3 OSR Bertillon Card Form: 1900s Card with "Eng. Ht"
itemType.description: If you do not have any data to enter into an element field, please enter n/a.

element.name: Prisoner Number
element.description: Found on the prisoner in the photograph.

element.name: Height
element.description: Please enter entire height, in the following format 171.1 for 1m 71.1cm

element.name: Eng. Ht.
element.description: Please enter height in the following format: 5-8.5 for 5 ft 8 1/2 in.

element.name: Outs. A.
element.description: "Outside Arm," a.k.a., "Reach." Please enter height, in the following format: 176.0 for 1m 76.0cm.

element.name: Trunk
element.description: "Height of a man seated"

element.name: H'd lgth
element.description: "Head length"

element.name: " wdth
element.description: "Head width"

element.name: Chk "
element.description: "Cheek width."

element.name: Lgth R. Ear
element.description: "Length of the Right Ear"

element.name: L. Foot
element.description: "Left foot length"

element.name: L. Mid F
element.description: "Left middle finger"

element.name: L. Lit. F
element.description: "Left little finger"

element.name: L Fore A
element.description: "Left forearm"

element.name: Measured at [Mansfield O]
element.description: This is a date field, if it says anything other than "Mansfield O" prior to a date, mark this record as "irregular" below. Please enter the date in the following format: 1902-03-31 for March 31, 1902.

element.name: by
element.description: Name of Bertillon Officer (usually R. U. Hastings). If this field contains anything other than R. U. Hastings's signature, mark this record as "irregular" below.

element.name: Anomaly Marker
element.description: Options: irregular, damaged

element.name: Cataloguer's Notes
element.description: Feel free to wax poetic about anything you notice, here.

elementText.text: large tear at top right corner

element.name: Height 2
element.description: Please enter entire height written in red, in the following format 171.1 for 1m 71.1cm

element.name: Eng. Ht. 2
element.description: Please enter height in the following format: 5-8.5 for 5 ft 8 1/2 in if a second height appears in red.

element.name: Outs. A. 2
element.description: "Outside Arm," a.k.a., "Reach." Please enter height, in the following format: 176.0 for 1m 76.0cm. Fill in if a second set of data appears in red.

element.name: Trunk 2
element.description: "Height of a man seated." Fill in if a second set of measurements is provided in red.

element.name: H'd lgth 2
element.description: "Head length." Fill in if a second set of measurements is provided in red.

element.name: " wdth 2
element.description: "Head width." Fill in if a second set of measurements is provided in red.

element.name: Chk " 2
element.description: "Cheek width." Fill in if a second set of measurements is provided in red.

element.name: Lgth R. Ear 2
element.description: "Length of the Right Ear." Fill in if a second set of measurements is provided in red.

element.name: L. Foot 2
element.description: "Left foot length." Fill in if a second set of measurements is provided in red.

element.name: L. Mid F 2
element.description: "Left middle finger." Fill in if a second set of measurements is provided in red.

element.name: L. Lit. F 2
element.description: "Left little finger." Fill in if a second set of measurements is provided in red.

element.name: L Fore A 2
element.description: "Left forearm." Fill in if a second set of measurements is provided in red.

element.name: by 2
element.description: Name of Bertillon Officer (usually R.U. Hastings). If this field contains anything other than R.U. Hasting's signature, mark this record as "irregular" below. Fill in if a second set of data is provided in red.

element.name: Remeasured When
element.description: If there is a remeasurement date or location, please enter it here. This often appears as a second date underneath the original measurement date, in red ink.

element.name: Remeasured When 2
element.description: If there is a second measurement in red, or the name of the person who remeasured the inmate, please include that here.

elementSet.name: Dublin Core
elementSet.description: The Dublin Core metadata element set is common to all Omeka records, including items, files, and collections. For more information see, http://dublincore.org/documents/dces/.

element.name: Title
element.description: A name given to the resource

element.name: Creator
element.description: An entity primarily responsible for making the resource

element.name: Source
element.description: A related resource from which the described resource is derived

element.name: Coverage
element.description: The spatial or temporal topic of the resource, the spatial applicability of the resource, or the jurisdiction under which the resource is relevant

element.name: Identifier
element.description: An unambiguous reference to the resource within a given context
